text: (kya is shaks ki rawish behtar hai ya us shaks ki) jo mutii-e-farmaan hai, raat ki ghadiyon mein khada rehta hai aur sajdey karta hai, aakhirat se darta aur apne Rubb ki rehmat se umeed lagata hai? In se pucho, kya jaanne waley aur na jaanne waley dono kabhi yaksan ho sakte hain? Naseehat to aqal rakhne waley hi qabool karte hain
